summary: Historical GAAP operating expense guidance and actuals for NVIDIA FY2025-FY2026
content:
## GAAP Operating Expenses - Actuals (quarterly)
- Q3 FY25 (Oct 2024): $4,287M
- Q4 FY25 (Jan 2025): $4,689M
- Q1 FY26 (Apr 2025): $5,030M
- Q2 FY26 (Jul 2025): $5,413M
- Q3 FY26 (Oct 2025): $5,839M

## Guidance for upcoming quarters (from previous earnings):
- Q1 FY26 guidance (from Q4 FY25 release, Feb 2025): ~$5.2B GAAP
- Q2 FY26 guidance (from Q1 FY26 release, May 2025): ~$5.7B GAAP
- Q3 FY26 guidance (from Q2 FY26 release, Aug 2025): ~$5.9B GAAP
- Q4 FY26 guidance (from Q3 FY26 release, Nov 2025): ~$6.7B GAAP

## QoQ growth in GAAP OpEx actuals:
- Q4 FY25: +9% QoQ
- Q1 FY26: +7% QoQ
- Q2 FY26: +8% QoQ
- Q3 FY26: +8% QoQ

## YoY growth in GAAP OpEx:
- Q3 FY26: +36% YoY
- Full year FY26 growth guided to "high-30% range"

## Key: Q4 FY25 actual GAAP OpEx was $4,689M. 
## The Q4 FY26 guidance from Q3 was $6.7B GAAP.
## Question asks: What will Q1 FY27 guidance be in Q4 FY26 release (Feb 25, 2026)?
